title: [1.8+]原版Boss--狼蛛
author: Helewo
txt_content:
相信大部分都是怕蜘蛛的[现实中],此刻带来的是OneCommand原版模组
对了，相信很多童鞋会想问什么事OneCommand?
引用一下版主的话~
"什么是OneCommand?
OneCommand是一种模块机制，将仅利用指令方块与帧高频结合的模块通过滤器转化为一条指令。"接下来现实的原图我就不放了- -本人也怕
输入指令，用红石块激活

别急。。。


生成好啦！然后呢，我们需要两个东西召唤~


我们需要一个蜘蛛眼


和一块叫Tarantula的钻石
接下来两个东西都Q键扔出去~Boss出来啦~


看这个Boss...


呵呵……
好了什么效果在游戏中体验吧~不过激活了指令方块他会告诉你一堆提示，技能暂时公布一下：
1.注射毒液：咬一口，萌萌哒，过来就咬，中毒10+反胃10状态10秒
2.防御：靠得太近，他会进行防御，打到无伤害并且咬你=w=
3,射毛：最恶心的技能，拨动屁股射你一脸……而且是从天上掉下来的……
恩……就这三个技能吧=w=，反正效果拔群
打死后奖励蛛牙


打死的奖励

注意：在这期间不要去打蜘蛛！打死也会奖励蛛牙！打死Boss后推荐直接移除系统
不推荐多人一起打


指令：
/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Tile:152,Time:10,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~-23 ~1 ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~2 ~-12 ~6 {Block:"minecraft:redstone_block",Time:1}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-12 ~10 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-11 ~10 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-10 ~9 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/execute @e[type=!Player,name=Tarantula] ~ ~ ~ /particle flame ~ ~1 ~ 1 1 1 0.002 5"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-9 ~9 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/execute @e[type=Item,score_summon_min=1,score_summon=1] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[type=Item,score_summon_min=2,score_summon=2,r=1] ~ ~ ~ summon FireworksRocketEntity ~ ~1 ~ {LifeTime:0,FireworksItem:{id:401,Count:1,tag:{Fireworks:{Explosions:[{Flicker:0,Trail:0,Type:3,Colors:[3289372],FadeColors:[1837599]}]}}}}"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon {display:{Name:\\"蛛牙\\",Lore:[\\"锋利的蛛牙可以碾碎一切！\\",\\"对蛛形生物有致命的效果！\\",\\"<它不会被破坏>\\"]},HideFlags:7,AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:4021968,UUIDMost:4021968,Amount:14,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:Damage},{Operation:1,UUIDLeast:8759099,UUIDMost:8759099,Amount:.65,AttributeName:generic.knockbackResistance,Name:K_Resistance},{Operation:1,UUIDLeast:672584,UUIDMost:672584,Amount:1,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health},{Operation:1,UUIDLeast:8432496,UUIDMost:8432496,Amount:.28,AttributeName:generic.movementSpeed,Name:Speed}],ench:[{id:32,lvl:8},{id:21,lvl:5},{id:19,lvl:1},{id:18,lvl:8},{id:17,lvl:5}],Unbreakable:1}"},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/execute ~4 ~1 ~11 quartz_block 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~5 ~4 ~2 ~11 stained_glass wall_sign 1 replace {Text1:"{text:\\"关闭系统╮(╯▽╰)╭\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:green,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~2 ~8 air\\"}}",Text2:"{text:\\"by Endman233\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:aqua,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~2 ~8 air\\"}}",Text3:"{text:\\"来自MCBBS\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:gold,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~2 ~8 air\\"}}"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/gamerule mobGriefing false"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/gamerule keepInventory true"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/gamerule commandBlockOutput false"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/tellraw @p [{text:"欢迎使用Endman233的OneCommand原版模组Boss--狼蛛=w=，目前为您介绍技能:\\n1.注射毒液：接近的话他会为您注射毒液，咬一口，味道棒棒哒，会恶心和中毒[]~(￣▽￣)~*\\n2.防御：如果考得过近，它不仅会注射毒液，且打它无伤害╮(╯_╰)╭\\n3.射毛：对了，它一身毛！不要靠得过近哦owo小心他的毛射你哦~(づ￣ 3￣)づ\\n大概技能就这么多了~我才不会告诉你这个文字可以点哒~\\n接下来是注意部分，推荐您在召唤boss期间使用最新的存档，对了，打完boss一定要移除系统啊~因为boss原型是一只蜘蛛，打死一只蜘蛛就会得到奖品，所以嘛~\\n关于召唤：一个普通的蛛眼和一个改名为Tarantula的钻石扔在一起就可以召唤啦~^_^！",color:aqua,clickEvent:{action:open_url,value:"http://www.mcbbs.net/home.php?mod=space&uid=1533657"}}]"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/scoreboard objectives add summon dummy"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/scoreboard objectives add kill stat.killEntity.Spider"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~ ~ ~27 ~1 air"}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}复制代码好的，小伙伴们开始打野吧0w0
别忘了留下你们的人气和金粒，不会怀孕的啦=w=
